rules: Headings must use 'Outfit'. Do not use Inter for headings.
Use 'tracking-tight' for all headings larger than 24px.
Use 'leading-relaxed' for body text to improve readability.
Avoid pure black (#000000) for text; use #1A1A1A or #2D2D2D.
Use Primary Green (#1A4D2E) for main CTAs and active states.
Use Accent Yellow (#F9E400) sparingly for high-impact highlights or 'Energy' metrics.
Backgrounds should be off-white (#F5F7F5) to reduce eye strain, not pure white.
Ensure contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1 for normal text.
Use generous spacing. If you think 'p-4' is enough, use 'p-8'.
Containers with borders must have internal padding (p-6 or p-8).
Mobile-first: Always start with single column and expand.

marketing.name: Tetris Grid (Mode A)
rules: Hero: col-span-full md:col-span-8 row-span-2
Feature: col-span-4 row-span-1
Visual: col-span-4 row-span-2
Never fill 100% perfectly; leave breathing room.

dashboard.name: High Density Bento (Mode B)
rules: Summary Card: col-span-1
Main Chart: col-span-2 row-span-2 or col-span-3
Feed/List: col-span-1 row-span-2
Use h-full to ensure equal heights.

buttons.primary: bg-[#1A4D2E] text-white hover:bg-[#143D24] rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-medium transition-all shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl hover:-translate-y-0.5
buttons.secondary: bg-[#F5F7F5] text-[#1A4D2E] border border-[#1A4D2E]/20 hover:bg-[#E8EBE8] rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-medium transition-all
buttons.ghost: text-[#1A4D2E] hover:bg-[#1A4D2E]/10 rounded-full px-6 py-2 transition-all

cards.base: bg-white rounded-2xl border border-border/40 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-300

inputs.base: bg-white border border-input rounded-lg px-4 py-2 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#1A4D2E]/20 focus:border-[#1A4D2E] transition-all

rules: Ensure all text has sufficient contrast (AA standard).
Use semantic HTML (header, main, footer, nav, section).
All interactive elements must have 'data-testid'.
Focus states must be visible (ring-2 ring-offset-2).

general: Use the provided image URLs for specific sections.
Implement the 'Tetris Grid' for the landing page and 'Bento Grid' for the dashboard.
Use Shadcn/UI for interactive components but style them with the defined color palette.
Do not use default Shadcn slate colors; override with the custom green/earth tones.

pages.landing: Create a high-impact hero section with the wind turbine background. Use large typography and clear CTAs.
pages.dashboard: Focus on data density and clarity. Use white cards on the off-white background. Use charts (Recharts) with the custom color palette.
pages.activities: Create a clean, multi-step form for emission tracking. Use progress indicators.
pages.insights: Use the 'impact_trees' image for the 'Trees Saved' metric card. Make it visual and emotional.

universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI slop' - generic, centered, boring designs.
Add micro-interactions to every button and card.
Export components as named exports, pages as default exports.
